oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clarksville-Montgomery County Consolidated Government Charter Commission: Public Safety and Courts Subcommittee Reports, 1980
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Public Safety and Courts Subcommittee determined the jurisdiction and responsibilities of the Fire Department and the Sheriff's Department. Equally, the final report called for the foundation of the Consolidated General Sessions Court.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Community development; Metropolitan government; Municipal charters; Municipal courts--Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: 1980 Charter Commission
